Can anyone still seed this ? We're stuck at 94.4%.

I got stuck at 99.8%. I think I saw somebody seeding yesterday, but I'm not sure (hopefully, s/he will show up again). Anyway, I'm leaving my computer running for the day.

As they are, things aren't that bad: the "main feature" is complete, and so are the interviews. The only part missing, is a tinny, little piece of the commentary track.

In case I got it, I promisse to seed the whole package, for at least a week, and without more than an hour break each day.
Please SEED!! I'm at 84.7% so far. I've been hunting for this movie for years with no success. Now that I'm this close... the suspense is driving me crazy ;-)
THANK YOU to the mysterious benefactor who seeded!!! I was able to finish the movie last night. Many hit & run, but when someone does something nice, we often forget to thank them. THANK YOU!!
